Event.Message: Process %1 started at time %2 by parent %3 running in session %4 with name %5.

Event.Message: Process %1 started at time %2 by parent %3 running in session %4 with name %6.

Event.Message: Process %1 (which started at time %2) stopped at time %3 with exit code %4.

Event.Message: Execution of the process %1 has been suspended.
